sourcesContent: import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { HomeService } from './home.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Dish } from './types/dish'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { data$: Observable = this.service.getData(); constructor(private service: HomeService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
